channel.title: I need help with what NPC's say!
channel.description:
I am having trouble with my what my NPC's say. I have edited the shops, but now i need to change the advertising of them.
[u]PLEASE HELP ME[/u]

item.title: I need help with what NPC's say!
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

[quote=“killah246, post:3, topic:73329”][quote author=cccrrraaazzziii link=topic=107763.msg1079936#msg1079936 date=1175531547]
Enter your ‘NPC Handler’, Hit ‘Ctrl+F’, and search for something your NPC currently says, then just simply edit it to what you like it to be. To look for others, just scroll up or down .
[/quote]

Yeah or go to tutorial list and find it[/quote] or not? because it would just be a spin-off tutorial and they would be locked.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with what NPC's say!
